title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Hey Stan, did you see that rainbow this morning?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Yeah, it was huge!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Oh, I hate those things.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The kids all look at Cartman puzzlingly.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Nobody HATES rainbows.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Yeah, what's there to HATE about rainbows?!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Well, you know... You'll just be sitting there minding your own business, and they'll come marching in and crawl up your leg and start biting the inside of your ass -

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Cartman makes gnashing sounds with his teeth.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: And you'll be all like 'Hey get out of my ASS YOU STUPID RAINBOWS!!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The boys sit in silence for several seconds... Nobody knows
text: what to say... Finally Stan speaks.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Cartman, what the HELL are you talking about?!?!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: I'm talking about rainbows! I hate those friggin' things.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Rainbows are little arches of color that show up during a rainstorm!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Ohhhhhh.... RAINBOWS. Oh yeah, I like those, those are cool.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Stan, Kyle and Kenny stare at Cartman in disbelief.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: What were YOU talking about?!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Huh? Oh, nothing, forget it.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: No! What marches in, crawls up your leg and bites the inside of your ass?!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Nothing....

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Just then, Mr. Garrison steps in front of the class.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Children! Children! remember the 'Save Our Fragile Planet' essay contest that you children worked so hard on last month?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The kids don't seem to remember.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: One of our VERY OWN South Park students has won the national prize!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The kids all gasp. Stan's face lights up.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: WOW! I knew I would win!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Garrison pulls an envelope out of his pocket.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Gosh Mr. Garrison, this sure is exciting!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: That's right, Mr. Hat. The winner of the national 'Save Our Fragile Planet' contest is... ERIC CARTMAN!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: (Shocked) WHAT?!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: (Just as shocked) What?!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Congratulations, Eric, on writing the award winning paper.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Kick ass.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: That's impossible!! Cartman doesn't know a rain forest from a pop-tart!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Yeah I do, Pop-Tarts are frosted.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Out of over a MILLION papers, Eric's was chosen as the grand prize winner!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Wow, what did you write about, Cartman?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: (Not remembering) Oh... You know... This and that.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: He doesn't even KNOW what he wrote about!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: What was your paper about, Wendy?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: MY paper was on the suffering of bottle-nosed dolphins.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Well you see? You shouldn't have written a paper about dolphins. Dolphins are stupid.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Dude, Dolphin's are like the second smartest animal on the planet!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: (Guffawing smugly) Oh, right... If they're so damn smart how come they get caught in those fishing nets all the time?!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: What?!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Wait, wait there's more! It says here that Eric's trophy will be presented to him by... (Pause, gulp) Kathie LEE GIFFORD!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Kathie Lee is coming to South Park?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: And the presentation will be on national television!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: TRACK into Stan, Kyle and Kenny as their eyes bulge out and
text: their smiles widen.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Television?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: (Quietly, to himself) Kathie Lee Gifford... I don't believe it...

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: INT. SOUTH PARK CAPITOL BUILDING - DAY

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The intense female MAYOR MCDANIELS of South Park is pacing
text: excitedly up and down her office. With her are a few male AIDES.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Kathie Lee Gifford in South Park...

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Mayor McDaniels walks over to the window and looks out upon
text: the small town square.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Oh My God, This is our chance to make a name for ourselves. To show that we're not just some pissant, whitebread mountain town!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Better yet it's a chance for YOU to get some publicity.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Yes! If I can show just how much I've turned South Park around... I could become a Senator!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Maybe even a STATE Senator!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Mayor, we should decorate the town square!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Then we should have the Chef of the school cafeteria sing a song, and play up the ethnic diversity of our town.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: That's right... He's a black guy isn't he?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: (Proudly) Black as the night itself, Mayor.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: (triumphantly) YES!! And we can even have the children of South Park put on a little play! Kathie Lee loves children!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: If they're working in a sweat-shop that is!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Ouch!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Thank You

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The boys are eating lunch at a table in the cafeteria.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: You guys, guess what... After I'm on television, I'm gonna be totally famous!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Hitler was famous too.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Wendy leaves. Chef comes sliding in.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Hello there children!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Hey Chef.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: How are my little crackers today?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Good.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Did you all hear about the news?! Kathie Lee Gifford is coming to South Park!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Yeah, 'cause Cartman cheated and won the environmental essay contest.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Hey!!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Yeah, Yeah, whatever, but the Mayor just called and asked ME to sing at the ceremony!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Wow, are you gonna do it?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Of course! Kathie Lee is a beautiful, sultry queen of sexual fantasy. And if I sing to her, maybe I can lure her into a night of exotic delectation.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Yeah! That'd be cool!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Mph rmph rm!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Well, THREE times bigger than Frank Gifford's anyway.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Garrison sits at the front of an empty classroom grading
text: some papers.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Oh, I can't even concentrate on grading papers with all this excitement!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Mr. Hat sits lifeless on a chair near the desk.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Why are you looking at me like that, Mr. Hat?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Have you forgotten about all the pain and suffering that Kathy Lee Gifford caused you?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Mr. Hat, that was a long time ago, and I was only a child.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: We could have WON that talent show... We could have been huge!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: A large banner reads 'National Talent Show Finals'

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: TILT DOWN from the banner and onto -

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: A smaller, ten year-old version of Mr. Garrison stands in a
text: huge spotlight on stage, with a smaller Mr. Hat on his arm.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Knock, knock, Mr. Hat.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Who's there?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Orange.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Orange who?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Orange you glad I didn't say banana?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Thank you.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: A smattering of applause echoes in the auditorium. Mr.
text: Garrison and Mr. Hat both bow and walk off stage. Several judges hold up their numbers - 8.9, 9, 7.8, 9.2

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Wow, Mr. Hat, it looks like we might win!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: 'And now our last Talent Show Finalist: Kathie Lee Epstein!!!'

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: A very young, cute Kathy Lee steps onto the stage, looking
text: adorable.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: (singing) ...If... they... could... See me now that little gang of mine, I'm eating fancy chow and drinking fancy wine..... ! How they would all say WOW!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: ZOOM OUT to reveal Lil' Kathie Lee Gifford singing and dancing
text: with a fifteen piece band and about 100 dancers all choreographed in utter harmony with her every move. WHOOSH! She now wears a puppet on each hand. Amazingly she manages to throw her voice to each puppet and continue singing herself, all in perfect harmony.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: (singing) If my friends could see me now...

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Kathie Lee is putting on a SPECTACULAR Broadway musical
text: number. Fountains go off! Fireworks explode!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Mr. Garrison and Mr. Hat watch on, dumbfounded.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: IF MY FRIENDS COULD SEE... ME... NOOOOOOOOOOWWWWwww!!!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The crowd ERUPTS with applause. The judges hold up their

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Mr. Garrison sits with glazed-over eyes.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: It wasn't fair, she had choreography. How could we compete with that?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: But now she's coming to South Park... And I know a way to make it ALL better!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: How?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Mr. Hat whispers in Garrison's ear. Garrison GASPS!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: No, Mr. Hat, I couldn't!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: I couldn't... KILL Kathie Lee Gifford!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Mayor McDaniels stands in front of the children.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Children, as you all know, Ms. Kathie Lee Gifford will be in South Park to present the award to some kid for an essay.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: That kid is me!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Whatever. Now, I'm going to have you Luscious little youngsters do a play about the history of South Park.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: That'll be wonderful! Won't it Mr. Hat?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: KILL HER!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Mr. Hat!!!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Garrison quickly puts his hand over Mr. Hat's mouth. The
text: Mayor looks oddly at Garrison and then continues.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The mayor turns to Mr. Garrison.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Mr. Garrison, I'm asking you to direct our little play.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Oh that's PERFECT! (To Mr. Hat) You see, Mr. Hat? We don't have to KILL her, we can just UPSTAGE her!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Mrs. Mayor? You might want to review the essays. We think Cartman might have cheated.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Who cares? Now kids, what say we give it our South Park best?!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The Mayor waits for the kids to cheer. They don't.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: And who's our little prize winner again?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: (Pissed off) ME!! ERIC CARTMAN!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: How about we get in shape, huh? We want to look our best for the T.V. cameras don't we?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Yes ma'am! (Singing) I'm gonna be on television! I'm gonna be on television!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The school bus drops the boys off at their bus stop. Cartman
text: is STILL singing the same song.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: (Singing) I'm gonna be on television! I'm gonna be on television!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: We don't believe for a minute that you won that contest fairly, fat boy!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Hey, stop defending your little girlfriend for writing about some stupid fish.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Dude, dolphins are intelligent and friendly!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Intelligent and friendly on rye bread with some mayonnaise.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Dolphins are way smarter than YOU!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: If they're so smart, why do they live in igloos?!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: DOLPHINS DON'T LIVE IN IGLOOS! THAT'S ESKIMOS!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Dolphins, Eskimos, who cares? It's all a bunch of tree-hugging hippie crap!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Tell me what you wrote about!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Uh, I can't, I have to go home and get in shape!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Yeah right, you'll go sit in front of the T.V. and eat Cheesy Poofs, assmaster!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Screw you, hippie!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Cartman sits on the couch watching television and eating
text: Cheesy Poofs. He plunges his hand into the huge barrel of Cheesey Poofs that sits beside him.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: We'll be right back to Jesus and Pals after this. A bunch of
text: muscle-builder guys stand around flexing.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: HEY! DO YOU NEED TO GET IN SHAPE FAST?!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: This catches Cartman's attention - his eyes dart to the
text: screen.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Wanna look your best? Tired of all the OTHER guys getting all the chicks?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Cartman turns up the volume on the remote.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Are you tired of being a ninety-pound weakling?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: A scrawny little guy gets punched in the face by a big, buff
text: muscle-builder.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Yeah! I only weigh ninety pounds!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Then bulk up QUICK with Weight Gain 4000.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The narrator flexes and muscles bulge out all over. Cartman's
text: eyes light up.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: YES!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: With over 4000 grams of saturated fat per serving, Its patented formula is designed to enter the mouth and go directly to the stomach where it is distributed to the bloodstream. Now available in stores everywhere. Get some today and say with me, BEEFCAKE.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: BEEFCAKE.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: BEEFCAKE!!!!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: BEEFCAKE!!!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: BEEFCAKE!!!!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: May cause irreversible damage to the kidneys and liver.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Mom, can you get me some WEIGHT GAIN 4000?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: O.K. Eric, I'll get you some at the store tomorrow.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: But mom I need it for tomorrow.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: But tomorrow is grocery day Eric.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: O.K., O.K. Well I guess I'll be going to the store now then.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Cartman's mom pulls her purse on and heads out the door.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Garrison is lying in bed, tossing and turning from a terrible
text: nightmare. We see whispy images floating through Garrison's thoughts -

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Finally, Garrison awakes, and jolts up to a sitting position.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: NO, NO!!!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Garrison wipes sweat from his brow, realizing it was all a
text: dream. Then he spots Mr. Hat in his little chair.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Kill her.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: No, Mr. Hat! I won't do it!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Mr. Hat's eyes begin to glow red. Mr. Hat's head starts
text: spinning around and around.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: KILLLLLLLLLL...

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: That does it. You're going in the dresser drawer Mr. Hat.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: She'll make a fool of you again.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Well, you can just stay in that drawer Negative Nancy.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Garrison throws the puppet in his dresser and locks it with
text: a little key. Immediately the dresser starts shaking and illuminating.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: EXT. SOUTH PARK - THE NEXT MORNING

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The sun rises over South Park.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Stan, Kenny, and Kyle all stand at the busstop waiting for
text: the bus to show up. Cartman comes waddling up in a tank top and holding a big tin of Weight Gain 4000.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Hey dudes.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: What the hell is wrong with you, Cartman? Haven't you noticed the three feet of snow on the ground?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Listen... I have a nice body and I wanna show it off. You got that?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The boys take a second to digest this one.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: What?! You've got to weigh ninety- pounds!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: I'm up to ninety-four, thank you very much.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Mrmnph phh mphph?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Yeah, they're almost as big as his mom's!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Laugh all you want. I'm the one who's gonna be on T.V. looking all buff.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: He takes the top off the tin and starts chowing down on the
text: weight gain powder.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: What's that stuff?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Weight Gain 4000. It's helping me bulk up.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Bulk up to what? Fat Ass?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Super Fat Ass?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Hey! I don't have to take that kinda crap from you scrawny weaklings!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The bus pulls up and the boys jump on. Cartman has an extra
text: hard time getting on the bus. He huffs and puffs toward the door. When he reaches the door, he has to turn sideways.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Sweet, check me out! I'm such a beefcake I can't even get through the door!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Townspeople are busy painting the buildings on the main drag
text: and hanging banners reading 'South Park Welcomes Kathie Lee Gifford!!!' The mayor is directing townspeople with a megaphone.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: C'mon people! We've got to turn this place around!! Hang up the lights! String up the banners! Castrate the cows!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The cows look up with concern.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Mr. Garrison's class stands around on the stage all dressed
text: in cute little historical outfits. Half the children are dressed as pioneers, and the other half are dressed as Indians. The Mayor walks up.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Well, Mr. Garrison, how is the little play going?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Huh? Oh... Fine, we were just about to run it from the top.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Oh, please do! I'm dying to see it!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Okay, All the little pioneers on this side of the stage.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: All the kids who are dressed in pioneer outfits go to one
text: side of the stage.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Good, and all the little Indians go to the center of the stage.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: A little boy named CLYDE steps forward.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Am I a Indian or a pioneer?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Do you have a feather on your head?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Yes.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Then you're an Indian.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Oh.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The Mayor sighs as Clyde walks to join the group of kids
text: dressed as Indians. Kenny is just wearing what he always wears with a little red feather sticking out of his hood.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Now Garrison moves in front of the curtain and stands next
text: to the Mayor.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Okay, BeBe this is your line.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: BEBE stands in front of the curtain in a little dress.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: (Reciting loudly) This is the story of South Park... It begins over a hundred years ago when the noble and hardy Ute Indians lived on the land.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Now the curtain opens revealing all the children dressed as
text: Indians sitting in around a little fake teepee.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Oh, don't they look adorable?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Then, from the east, came the great white pioneers...

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Suddenly, all the children who were dressed as pioneers come
text: CHARGING onto the stage and immediately start beating the crap out of the kids dressed as Indians.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The Mayor watches in horror as the Indians are pummeled
text: senseless by the pioneers.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Oh my God!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: They did it a lot better this morning. They had more energy.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: The pioneers met with the Indians, and negotiated for their fertile lands...

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The children continue to fight. All the little Indian kids
text: are thrown off stage and beaten to a pulp.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Mr. Garrison! We cannot have our children beating each other senseless in front of Kathie Lee Gifford!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Well, what do you want? This is how it happened in those days.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Stan kicks Clyde in the ribs repeatedly.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Take THAT you stupid Indian!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Ow!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Now the kids are really into it, the Mayor and Mr. Garrison
text: have to shout over the growing moans and cries.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: MR. GARRISON! THIS IS NOT APPROPRIATE! DO YOU ACTUALLY THINK THAT Kathie LEE GIFFORD WOULD ENJOY THIS?!?!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: TO HELL WITH Kathie LEE GIFFORD!!!!!!!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Everybody stops... The kids quit fighting and stare at Mr.
text: Garrison with disbelief. You could hear a pin drop.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Garrison covers his mouth and looks around as if to say he
text: himself can't even believe what he just said.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Oh my God... What have I said?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: South Park residents gather around looking astounded. A
text: ominous silence spreads throughout the square as all eyes rest on Mr. Garrison.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: (gasping) He said 'to HELL with Kathie Lee Gifford'!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The whole town continues to stare in absolute shock. Shamed,
text: Mr. Garrison hangs his head.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Mr. Garrison, I am dismissing you from directing our play.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Mr. Garrison steps down from the stage.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Mr. Garrison unlocks his dresser drawer and slides it open.
text: Mr. Hat lays face up.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: It happened again, didn't it?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Mr. Garrison picks up Mr. Hat and puts him on his hand.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Now we do things MY WAY.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: I can't kill her, Mr. Hat! (Pause) You're going to have to do it!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: EXT. SOUTH PARK AVENUE - THE NEXT DAY

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The sign at the town square reads 'Days until Kathie Lee
text: Arrives'. Dress rehearsal for the big event. Everyone in South Park is making final preparations. The Mayor is directing where everybody goes. Stan, Kyle and Kenny stand on stage in little pioneer and Indian costumes. Cartman heaves himself up onto the platform. The platform bulges and CREEKS under his enormous weight.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Whoa Cartman, talk about wide load!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Yeah, I'm really starting to fill out nicely.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: You're not 'filling out nicely', you're fatter than ever!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: I'm not fat, I'm getting in shape!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Cartman, you're SUCH a fat ass, that when you walk down the street people go 'GOD DAMN IT, THAT'S A BIG FAT ASS!'

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: No they don't, you jealous weakling!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: A RANDOM TOWNSPERSON walks by and sees Cartman.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: God Damn, that is a big fat ass!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Hey!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Hi guys.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Oh, look, another hippie. Peace, Wendy.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Shut up, Cartman!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: (Singing) Oh, two little hippies sittin' in a tree......!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: I'm gonna find Cartman's paper and get to the bottom of this!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: INT. SOUTH PARK GUN SHOP - DAY

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: A pleasant GUNSMITH is locking some weapons behind a glass
text: case when he hears the little BELL announce that somebody has come in.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Can I help you?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The gunsmith turns around to see Mr. Garrison, hobbled over
text: and wearing a long trenchcoat that covers much of his face. He looks crazed and nervous.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Yes... I need a gun.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Would this be for hunting, home- protection or other?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Other.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Alrighty, then may I suggest the Stratford twelve millimeter. Here, try it on.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The Gunsmith hands Garrison the large, black rifle and leads
text: him over to a set of mirrors, angled just like the ones in clothing stores.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: That looks really nice on you. The lacquered black really matches your eyes.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Garrison turns around and looks himself up and down.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: (To the mirror) You talkin' to me? You talkin' to me? (To the Gunsmith) I don't know... It's a little small.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Okay, how about this?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The Gunsmith quickly replaces the Stratford with another,
text: larger rifle. Again, Garrison twirls around in the mirror with the gun in his hands.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: (To the mirror) You talkin' to me? (To the Gunsmith) Mmmm, no. I don't like this one either.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Here's the same gun with a wood finish.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: You talkin' to me? I don't see anybody else around here. So you must be talkin' to me.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Mr. Garrison turns to the Gunsmith.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: I'll take it.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The classroom is dark and silent. The door CREEKS open and a
text: shaft of blue moonlight spills through. Wendy pokes her head in.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: (in a whisper) Hello?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: She tiptoes to the back of the room and opens a file cabinet.
text: Inside is a manila envelope labeled 'Save Our Planet Essay Contest.'

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: She opens the folder and flips through the papers.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: She comes to her paper, which the judges have scored with a
text: big circled 72 written on it and the phrase 'Good Try Little girl - But if dolphins are so smart, why do they get caught in fishing nets all the time?'

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Wendy grinds her teeth and fumes for a moment.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: After a few more papers, she comes to the one with a big
text: blue ribbon on it. It is an incredibly thick essay, nearly 300 pages. Wendy pulls it out and starts to read it out loud.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: (Reading) My Essay - By Eric Cartman... When I wrote the following pages, or rather the bulk of them, I lived alone, in the woods on the shore of...

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The door opens! Wendy shoves the paper in her jacket and
text: drops behind a desk.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: A dark figure moves across the classroom. Wendy peeks up and
text: sees Mr. Garrison taking off his overcoat. He sits down at his desk, flips on a lamp, and throws Mr. Hat on a chair.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Well Mr. Hat, I guess ol' Kathie Lee really will be surprised when she gets here tomorrow...

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Mr. Hat sits limp on the chair. Mr. Garrison starts to polish
text: his gun.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: She beat us in the talent show all those years ago... And I think we OWE her for that!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Wendy peeks out from behind the desk. Garrison points the
text: gun and looks through the sight.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: BANG!!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: CLICK!! Mr. Garrison dry shoots the gun. Wendy eyes grow
text: huge as Garrison's laughter reverberates throughout the room.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: (Softly) Oh my God!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: EXT. SOUTH PARK TOWN SQUARE - MORNING

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The sign now reads 'Days Until Kathie Lee Arrives' and a
text: hand removes the '1' so that it reads 'TODAY!!'.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The sun rises over South Park as the whole town fills the
text: town square on the big day.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Kyle stands with his little brother IKE, who bounces in and
text: out of frame wearing a blue jumpsuit with 'I LOVE Kathie LEE' sewed on the front.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: EXT. SOUTH PARK TOWN SQUARE - DAY

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Garrison walks down the street holding his large, black rifle.
text: Some townspeople notice him, but simply smile and wave hello.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Howdy, Mr. Garrison, nice gun!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Thank you.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Nice gun, Mr. Garrison!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Thanks. Hello Officer Barbrady.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Nice gun.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Thanks. Is there somewhere in town where I can get a good, clear shot-a- view of Kathie Lee?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Hmm... You know, I think the book depository would be a good bet.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: EXT. SOUTH PARK BOOK DEPOSITORY - DAY

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The depository, a two story, wooden building, stands utterly
text: empty on the other side of the street. Two vultures fly in a circle around it.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: EXT. SOUTH PARK TOWN SQUARE - DAY

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Yes... Yes, that might do quite nicely. Thank you, Officer Barbrady.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: In a trance, Garrison slowly walks towards the depository.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: No problem.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Suddenly, Barbrady rips a camera out of the hands of another
text: townsperson.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Ha! Caught you red handed! NO PICTURES OF Kathie LEE!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Barbrady grabs the guy and whisks him off.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The Mayor stands on the stage nervously awaiting Kathie Lee's
text: arrival. She checks her watch.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Where is she?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Meanwhile, the kids are backstage, getting ready for their
text: performance.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: This is sweet. The camera crews are setting up, and I'm looking totally ripped. Beefcake BEEFCAKE!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Cartman slurps down some more Weight Gain 4000.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: I don't think they're gonna be able to get all of you in frame, Cartman.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: You guys! We have to stop him!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Stop who?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Mr. Garrison! He's going to try to KILL Kathie Lee Gifford!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Oh no you don't! You're not gonna ruin MY moment of fame!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: He's got a gun!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: You gotta get over this whole jealousy thing alright. Seriously, just face it, I wrote a better paper than you.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: It just so happens that I HAVE your paper and I KNOW why you won!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: There's something more important right now. Let's go!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Wendy, you've got to Prioritize!! What's more IMPORTANT? Being on TV, or some stupid assassination?!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Stan, I can't do it alone. Please?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Wendy makes a sad face at Stan. Stan's eyes droop.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Uh-oh, we're losing him.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: HERE SHE COMES!!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: EXT. SOUTH PARK TOWN SQUARE - DAY

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The townspeople all cheer and wave 'Welcome' flags. The lame
text: South Park marching band marches down the street.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Following close behind is a vehicle that has been modified
text: with bullet-proof glass - just like the famous 'POPE MOBILE'. Inside the glass bubble, waving happily is Kathie Lee Gifford.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The vehicle is also surrounded by several suited guards who
text: look like secret service. They are all looking around with their fingers in their ears.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: INT. SOUTH PARK BOOK DEPOSITORY - DAY

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Garrison is sitting at a window of the book depository with
text: his gun pointing outside.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Damn! I guess I'm not the only person in America who's thought of killing Kathie Lee Gifford.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: EXT. SOUTH PARK TOWN SQUARE - DAY

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The Pope-mobile continues down the street.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: WE LOVE YOU Kathie LEE!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Kathie Lee responds, maybe she says 'I love you too', but
text: she is inaudible through the thick glass.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: INT. SOUTH PARK BOOK DEPOSITORY - DAY

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Come on, you little bitch...

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Garrison looks through the HUGE scope on his rifle.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The crosshairs of the sight lie directly in front of Kathie
text: Lee's head. Through the sight, Garrison notices that the trophy is inside the bubble with Kathie Lee.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: You've got to come out of your precious bubble sooner or later, Missy.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The pope-mobile rides past them and finally reaches the stage.
text: The Mayor steps up to the microphone.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: It is with great pride and honor that I'd like to welcome Mrs. Kathie Lee Gifford to South Park!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: And now, our very own South Park Elementary Chef will sing a special song in honor of Mrs. Lee-Gifford!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Kathie Lee rolls her eyes, and then tries desperately to
text: look thrilled, as Chef steps up to the mic.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Thank you, Mr. Mayor. You know... Kathie-Lee, you are a very special woman...

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Groovy Isaac Hayes music starts to fade in. The BAND MEMBERS
text: are in the background getting funky.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: I don't mean special in a Mary Tyler- Moore way... Or special in a extra value meal at Happy Burger way... No no no no-

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: I mean SPECIAL... Like... The song of a hummingbird as it gets ready to... to find that female hummingbird, and -- make sweet love to it -- all night long. Just two hummingbirds moanin' and groanin' and letting their bodies caress and touch each other in ecstasy...

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Now the groove breaks into a full-fledged soul song.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: (Singing) Ooh Kathie Lee How I'd love to lay you down And lick every inch of your body with my tongue.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: What???

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Kathie Lee, you're my sexual fantasy. How 'bout you and me?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: What???

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Kathie Lee is in absolute shock. The Mayor tries to stop
text: Chef.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: (Grabbing the mic) Uh, thank you Chef for that heartwarming song-

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: (Still singing) Make sweet love.....

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: (in total shock) THANK YOU, CHEF!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The music stops. A few people applaud. Chef is hurried off
text: the stage.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: God bless you Kathie Lee!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Kathie Lee waves from inside her bubble, again, trying to
text: look happy, but visibly uncomfortable.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Wendy and Stan frantically run through the crowd. They spot
text: Officer Barbrady.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Officer Barbrady! Mr. Garrison is about to kill Kathie Lee! We have to find him!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: What? You mean the teacher? Wait a minute...

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Barbrady thinks. A thought bubble appears above him, replaying
text: the scene from earlier.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Thanks. Is there somewhere in town where I can get a good, clear shot-a- view of Kathie Lee?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Hmm... You know, I think the book depository would be a good bet.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Barbrady keeps thinking. Wendy patiently waits. Again the
text: same scene plays.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: I think the book depository would be a good bet. Book depository would be a good bet. Book depository good bet Book depository

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Damn! He could be anywhere! I'll send out an A.P.B.!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Wendy, look!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Stan points up to the book depository where Mr. Hat is peeping
text: over a gun barrel that is sticking out of the second story window. Wendy gasps and runs toward it.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: And now, Here to present the award for the Environmental essay to our own Eric Kaufman-

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Cartman, God Dammit!!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: -Is your favorite celebrity and mine; Kathie LEE GIFFORD!!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The townspeople go nuts. Kathie Lee, still in her large
text: bubble, is hoisted onto the stage. The glass holder falls over at first, but the servicemen are right there to pick her back up.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Now Kathie Lee speaks, but the glass is so thick that we
text: still can't quite hear what she is saying.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Thank you! How I love you all!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Mr. Garrison! Stop!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Garrison spins around and sees Wendy and Stan standing in
text: the doorway.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: LEAVE US! WE MUST FINISH WHAT WE HAVE BEGUN!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Garrison turns back to the window and again takes aim.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: I know that she's hurt you, she's hurt a lot of people.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Now Garrison turns back to Wendy with a different look.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: You... Can't know...

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: YOU should have won that talent show.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Stan looks confused but Garrison's face lights up.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: (Still mostly inaudible) It is with great honor and pride that I present the winner this trophy.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Now Kathie Lee bends down and picks up the trophy. She opens
text: the door hatch in her bubble and takes a step out.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Eric, would you please come up here.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Cartman walks slowly up the stairs to the stage, fat literally
text: dragging behind him.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Here it is! My big moment of fame!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: And then she finished it all by throwing her voice with TWO dummies at once.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: I know that, Mr. Garrison, but this isn't the answer.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: It is too late for me... Young Wendy.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: You see, I've learned something today. You can't win all the time. And if you don't win... You certainly can't hold it against the person who DID, because... That's the only way you ever really lose.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: You're... You're right.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Garrison sets the gun down and walks toward Wendy and Stan
text: with a smile growing on his face.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Good...

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Man, did she really throw her voice with TWO dummies at once?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: THE BITCH MUST DIE!!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Garrison spins around, grabs the gun, and points it out the
text: window. The gunshot fires! BLAM!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Cartman steps off of the stairs and puts his weight on the
text: stage. The stage immediately collapses on his side, firing Kathie Lee up into the air like a rocket.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: AAAAGGHH!!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Cartman falls underneath the stage as the bullet flies past
text: where Kathie Lee was standing - and heads directly for Kenny.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Mm Nmm!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The bullet hits Kenny, whose poor little body goes flying
text: across the stage, then he lands upside down in a large barrel of water, which immediately turns blood red.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Oh my God! they killed Kenny! (Shaking his fist) You bastard!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The Secret Servicemen take action and jump all over Kathie
text: Lee, protecting her body from any more bullets.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: GUN!! GUN!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The men then quickly shove Kathie Lee in her bubble and drive
text: away.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Hey!! Come back!! We didn't even get to do our play!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: But within seconds Kathie Lee is gone. Her entire entourage
text: disappears over the horizon.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: I guess that's it guys. Wrap it up.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Hey, wait a minute! When do I get to be on television?!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Forget it, kid. No Kathie Lee, no public interest.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: But I won the environmental essay contest!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Wendy Testaburger jumps onto the stage.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: You don't DESERVE to win, Cartman, and YOU know it!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Wendy steps up to the microphone and holds up a VERY thick
text: stack of papers.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: I'm holding Cartman's award winning paper! It's actually nothing more than 'Walden' with Henry David Thoreau's name crossed out and Cartman's name written in its place!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The townspeople all look at each other. Cartman gulps.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Who cares?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Yeah, Kathie Lee Gifford's gone.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The townspeople all concur and begin to disperse.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: What about not holding anything against the person who wins?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Well not if it's CARTMAN!! Hey where are you all going?!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The townspeople all disappear, leaving the kids alone.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: (Vanquished) They don't even know what Walden is. (Shouting again) I bet if Walden was a sitcom you'd all know what it was!!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Come on, Wendy. Kyle's mom'll make us tuna fish sandwiches.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Oh, what the hell.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: (Sobbing) NO!! NO!! Now I'll be stuck in this podunk town forever with all these stupid, hick, redneck, jobless, truck driving idiots!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Uh, mayor, the mic is on.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Suddenly, the doors to the book depository open, and Officer
text: Barbrady appears holding Mr. Garrison's left arm.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Thought you could get away with it, eh Mr. Hat?!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Well, I would have gotten away with it if it weren't for those meddling kids.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: You're lucky you missed Kathie Lee Gifford and that nobody got hurt.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Barbrady throws Garrison in the back seat, gets in the car
text: and speeds away past Kenny's little bleeding body.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: EXT. SOUTH PARK MENTAL HOSPITAL - DAY

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The white mental hospital sits pleasantly between two mountain
text: peaks.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: INT. SOUTH PARK MENTAL HOSPITAL - DAY

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Mr. Garrison sits in a padded room surrounded by Kenny, Kyle,
text: Wendy and Stan. Mr. Hat is in a little straight jacket, but Garrison isn't.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: We hope you can come back to school real soon, Mr. Garrison.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Well children, I'd love to. But the doctors say that Mr. Hat needs more therapy...

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Mr. Hat pops out from the side.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: WE CAN STILL GET HER!! MMFF MF!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: I'm just so sorry that I ruined everyone's chances for being on T.V.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Not Cartman, he get's to be on T.V. anyway.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Really? On what?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Obesity, Adiposity, Corpulence... Whatever word you use it represents one thing... Being a big fat ass. (pause) We have with us today, live via satellite, Eric Cartman from South Park. Who is now so obese he can't even get out of his house.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: ANGLE - MONITOR - CARTMAN IN HIS BED

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: Cartman is lying on his bed with a blanket wrapped around
text: him. The words on the bottom of the screen read 'Eric Cartman - Fat Ass - Live Via Satellite.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: When is this gonna be on the air?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Is there anything you'd like to say to people out there?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Follow your dreams. You can reach your goals. I'm living proof. Beefcake BEEFCAKE!!!

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: The television in Chef's room, with Geraldo's image, snaps
text: off. Chef is lying in his bed with the remote control. He puts the remote down and takes a long drag from his cigarette.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: He needs to run his ass around the block a few times.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
role: An arm drapes over Chef. PULL BACK to reveal that Kathie Lee
text: is lying in bed naked next to Chef.

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Mmmm, how about a little more of that good loving, Chef?

title: WEIGHT GAIN
text: Damn woman, I just gave you sweet lovin' 5 minutes ago. You tryin' to kill me?
